mapper.sql: select A.bill_id , A.bill_no , A.bill_name -- 안건 이름 , A.ppsr_id , A.ppsr_nm -- 제안자 이름 , A.member_nm , A.bill_name_kg , A.bill_name_ru , A.bill_kind , A.scl_dsc_rcp_nmb , A.na_term_cd , A.ppsl_dt , A.rcp_dt , A.reg_dt , A.regDate , A.current_step_id , A.stat_nm , A.stat_cd , A.etc from ( select em.bill_id , em.bill_name_kg , em.bill_name_ru , fngetlangnm(em.bill_name_kg, em.bill_name_ru, em.bill_name_kg, #{lang}) as bill_name , em.bill_no , em.bill_kind , em.scl_dsc_rcp_nmb , em.na_term_cd , em.ppsr_id , fngetlangnm(vum.member_nm_kg, vum.member_nm_ru, vum.member_nm_kg, #{lang}) as ppsr_nm , fngetlangnm(vum.member_nm_kg, vum.member_nm_ru, vum.member_nm_kg, #{lang}) as member_nm , em.etc_kg , em.etc_ru , fngetlangnm(em.etc_kg, em.etc_ru, em.etc_kg, #{lang}) as etc , em.ppsl_dt , em.rcp_dt , em.reg_dt , to_char(em.reg_dt, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:mi') as regDate -- 등록일 , ebi.current_step_id , ebs.stat_cd , fngetcodenm('1010', ebs.stat_cd, #{lang}) as stat_nm from ebs_master em left join view_user_member vum on (em.ppsr_id = vum.user_id) left join ebs_bp_instance ebi on em.bill_id = ebi.bill_id left join ebs_bp_step ebs on ebi.bp_df_id = ebs.bp_df_id and ebi.current_step_id = ebs.step_id ) A

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.billApply.apply.repository.ApplyMapper.selectBill */ select AA.* , ep.sign_dt , ep.sign_cnc_dt , ep.wt_dt , ep.wt_cnc_dt , case when (ep.sign_dt is not null and ep.sign_cnc_dt is null) then 'Y' else 'N' end as agreeYn -- 동의여부 , case when (ep.wt_dt is not null and ep.wt_cnc_dt is null) then 'Y' else 'N' end as revokeYn -- 철회동의여부 , kgst.fngetlangnm(emd.rmrk_kg, emd.rmrk_ru, emd.rmrk_kg, #{lang}) as wt_cn -- 철회사유 from (
) AA left join kgst.ebs_proposer ep on (AA.bill_id = ep.bill_id and ep.proposer_id = #{userId}) left outer join kgst.ebs_master_detail emd on (AA.bill_id = emd.bill_id and emd.cls_cd = '400') --철회정보 where 1=1 and AA.bill_id = #{billId}

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.billApply.apply.repository.ApplyMapper.selectApplyDetail */ select em.bill_name_kg -- 안건이름kg , em.bill_name_ru -- 안건이름ru , kgst.fngetlangnm(view.member_nm_kg,view.member_nm_ru,view.member_nm_kg,#{lang}) as member_nm -- 제안자 이름 , em.ppsr_id -- 제안자아이디 , em.etc_kg -- 비고kg , em.etc_ru -- 비고ru , kgst.fngetlangnm(em.etc_kg,em.etc_ru,em.etc_kg,#{lang}) as etc , to_char(em.reg_dt, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:mi') as regDate -- 등록일 , em.scl_dsc_rcp_nmb -- 사회토론번호 , em.ppsl_dt -- 제안일 , em.bill_no -- 안건번호 , (select emc.cmt_cd from kgst.ebs_master_cmt emc where emc.bill_id = em.bill_id and emc.cmt_se_cd = 'M') as cmt_cd , ebi.current_step_id from kgst.ebs_master em left join kgst.ebs_bp_instance ebi on (em.bill_id = ebi.bill_id) left join kgst.view_user_member view on (view.member_id = em.ppsr_id) where em.bill_id = #{billId}
/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.billApply.apply.repository.ApplyMapper.getProposerInfo */ select member_id , poly_cd , poly_nm from kgst.com_member where member_id = #{memberId}

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.billApply.apply.repository.ApplyMapper.selectApplyFileList */ select ef.seq , ef.bill_id , ef.file_kind_cd , ef.cls_cd , ef.org_file_id , ef.org_file_nm , ef.pdf_file_id , ef.pdf_file_nm , ef.rmk , ef.opb_yn , ef.delete_yn , ef.file_size , ef.reg_id , ef.reg_dt , ef.mod_id , ef.mod_dt , ef.detail_seq from kgst.ebs_file ef where ef.bill_id = #{billId} and ef.delete_yn = 'N' order by file_kind_cd asc, ef.reg_dt asc

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.billApply.apply.repository.ApplyMapper.selectApplyFileList */ select ef.seq , ef.bill_id , ef.file_kind_cd , ef.cls_cd , ef.org_file_id , ef.org_file_nm , ef.pdf_file_id , ef.pdf_file_nm , ef.rmk , ef.opb_yn , ef.delete_yn , ef.file_size , ef.reg_id , ef.reg_dt , ef.mod_id , ef.mod_dt , ef.detail_seq from kgst.ebs_file ef where ef.bill_id = #{billId} and ef.delete_yn = 'N'
and file_kind_cd in ('110', '120', '130')
and file_kind_cd in ('140', '150', '160')
order by file_kind_cd asc, ef.reg_dt asc
